desc: Shop online for indigenous art, jewellery and crystals all collected, designed and polished at the Crystal Cabin lapidary workshop in picturesque Haida Gwaii, Canada.

layout.text: Art & Jewelry by Indigenous Artists & Canadian Crystals

"Crystal Cabin is a very precious jewel in the heart of Haida Gwaii. These sisters have deep roots in the community and beyond, ethically sourcing what they sell and providing excellent customer service on and off island." - Customer review
